text: THE Universal Father is the God of all creation, the First Source and Center of all things and beings.
The myriads of planetary systems were all made to be eventually inhabited by many different types of intelligent creatures.
The enlightened worlds all recognize and worship the Universal Father, the eternal maker and infinite upholder of all creation.
Of all the names by which God the Father is known throughout the universes, those which designate him as the First Source and the Universe Center are most often encountered.
The Universal Father never imposes any form of arbitrary recognition, formal worship, or slavish service upon the intelligent will creatures of the universes.
